title: Amy Walter, Steve Kornacki and Howard Univ. President Dr. Wayne Frederick
description: Ok, let's talk politics. Amy Walter, National Editor of the Cook Political Report, and Steve Kornacki, National Political correspondent for NBC News, join Chuck for a virus-free discussion of the 2020 political landscape. Plus, Howard University president Dr. Wayne A.I. Frederick to discuss the future of college reopenings.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
